name: GOD SAVE THE QUEEN (PreyK)
description:
Experience the everyday life of an ant hill!

Ants fighting for their life on the streets every day to save their queen and the nest.

Ants are cool!

The game is set on New York's street, your task is to avoid people stepping ot to you and get food into the hill.

Controls:

The player is controlling a crowd of ants.

W/A/S/D - move

SPACE - jump

Xbox one controller/Xinput:

Left stick - move

Y - jump
